alert.message:
No Gitlab instances or the number reached the limits, max value is 30. 
If value is <1, please check and startup at least one Gitlab instances.
alert.name: Gitlab No Running APP Instances

alert.message:
Gitlab have no or more than 1 NFS instances.
Please check and make sure only one NFS instance is running.
alert.name: Gitlab No Running NFS Instances or more than one Running instances
Gitlab APP instances scalling now...(in or out)
Gitlab some instances are down...

alert.message:
GitLab-Jenkins Build Trigger Time latency too high: > 1 minutes for 20 minutes.  Possible reason: 1, Jenkins issue; 2, Gitlab-Jenkins credential issue, eg. password changed?;
More detail: https://grafana.onecmd.com/d/gitlab-alert-0/gitlab-alerts
alert.name: GitLab-Jenkins Build Trigger Time(< 1Min) alert

alert.message: One or more Gitlab instances CPU usage large than 85% for 1 minutes. Detail: https://grafana.onecmd.com/d/gitlab-alert-0/gitlab-alerts
alert.name: Gitlab some Instances CPU Usage > 85%

alert.message: One or more Gitlab instances memory usage large than 85% for 1 minutes. Detail: https://grafana.onecmd.com/d/gitlab-alert-0/gitlab-alerts
alert.name: Gitlab some Instances Memory Usage > 85%

alert.message: One or more Gitlab instances Disk usage more than 85%. https://grafana.onecmd.com/d/gitlab-alert-0/gitlab-alerts
alert.name: Gitlab some Instances Disk Usage > 90%

alert.message: Gitlab instance disk IOPS is high, max value is 6000.
alert.name: Gitlab Instances Disk Reads/Writes Completed > 6000

alert.message:
More than 5 projects or users had been removed, please check it:
https://grafana.onecmd.com/d/kzQ4tqZWz/gitlab-overview
Removed logs
alert.name: Total Projects|Users(If removed > 10 in 5 minutes) changed much...
Gitlab metrics health & Prometheus status not health...
